product_name: Merrell Adore Wrap Sandals - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The lightweight Merrell Adore Wrap Sandals give you a barefoot feel when you're strolling the boardwalk or taking care of errands around town. Synthetic and nubuck leather uppers have attractive cutout details. EVA footbeds are covered with pigskin leather for great comfort, and feature Aegis(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial treatment to help deter odor development. 0mm drop from heel to toe encourages a natural feel when you're walking around. Vibram(R) rubber soles provide good grip. Closeout.
short_description: The lightweight Merrell Adore Wrap Sandals give you a barefoot feel when you're strolling the boardwalk or taking care of errands around town.
